body.name: Dust Pan and Brush Set, Hand Broom and Dustpan Set, Small Broom with Dustpan Combo Set …
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 21 mins
features: Quick Clean Up-The dust pan and brush set allows you to clean up dry messes in seconds, rather than pull out the big vacuum. The small broom and dustpan are great for cleaning up after DIY projects as well as normal everyday household use

All Kinds of Spills-The small hand sweeper is handy for kitchen counter like collecting crumbs, spilled salt/sugar, wrappings, for camping like getting dirt out of the tent, for pets like cats litter box etc
Easy Storage-When you’re done, snap the brush into the dustpan, and store with its convenient hang-up feature, always keep the hand broom and dustpan set within reach

Master Design-The teeth at both sides of the dust pans offer hands free cleaning for brush. The scraper removes the hard residue. Handle is angled for quick and easy countertop use. Thanks to the perfect angle of the pan, even the smallest crumbs are gathered up rather than sliding underneath

Goes into Tight Place- The angle of the brush and the round shape of the brush head make it easy to reach even in corners and smaller spaces. It's great for cleaning up after kids and pets, as well as getting the crumbs off your keyboard etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for vehicle
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my semi truck work great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this brush and dust pan set to get the crumbs off my countertop and dining table before cleaning. It’s been very useful! It’s well made and I really like that the brush is stored in the pans handle. It has an hole on the pans handle so it easily hands in my laundry room on a wall hook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Great little dust pan set for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect the small size, but it is built well so not a problem. Nice little set, would like to find a bigger one just like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dustpan and hand broom!
reviews.reviewText: This dustpan and hand broom set is very handy! I mainly purchased it for cleaning crumbs and the like from my dining room tablecloth, but it has quickly become a staple in other places, as well! The quality is decent: hard, durable-seeming plastic. Solid bristles. It works great at getting little messes up. It is lightweight and easy to handle and use. I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sweeping up small spills.
reviews.reviewText: I actually really like this. I have a small kitchen and this is more convenient than bringing out a large broom. It’s made of good material, I’d recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy to Have, Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes I have just a few crumbs on the floor, or even a leaf or two that gets tracked into the house, and this Dust Pan and Brush set is perfect to use for cleaning up small particles like that. The handle of the brush fits nicely into the handle of the dustpan, snug enough to stay together, but not too tight in that it's hard to separate. The opening for hanging it is plenty big, giving me the option of what kind of hook to use when storing it. If you don't want to use a vacuum or full-size broom to tackle small areas of debris, this is a good brush and dust pan set to have on hand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dustpan/broom set for a workshop
reviews.reviewText: This is a good industrial-style dustpan and broom set, made from heavy plastic with strong long nylon bristles. Its appearance is plain and workmanlike, but it's well-designed, even including "teeth" on the upper edges of the dustpan that you can use to scrape dust bunnies out of the brush bristles.For the price, you get good quality and good design, I don't think it'll ever wear out. Since none of its components care about getting wet, it looks like you actually could use it in your kitchen to sweep cuttings into the trash or sink, as long as you don't care about style. I doubt I'll ever use it that way but see no reason it wouldn't do just fine.Recommended to help keep things neat and clean everywhere!
